synopsis.text: Can Nao salvage her relationship with Uehara after forgetting his birthday? This is the central question in this anime, which follows the story of two high school students who accidentally end up living together in the same apartment. Despite the potential scandal of their living arrangement, Nao and Uehara manage to keep it a secret from their classmates. However, when Nao agrees to be a hair model for a handsome stylist on Uehara's birthday, she forgets all about her boyfriend's special day. Will Nao be able to make it up to Uehara and save their relationship, or will this be the end of their happy life together? This anime was first shown at the Ribon Otanoshimi Anime Matsuri festival in 2001 and was later released on VHS.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
